title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
tosdr.tldr: If they (in their opinion) require some data to carry out a contract and you don't provide that data they can immediately close your account without prior notice. As the required personal data can be changed at any time and may not even be the same for all customers, this is basically a suspension loophole.
